about.summary: The purpose of this library is to move the terminal cursor around and manipulate text by using intuitive method calls.

name: rb-tty-cursor
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "tty-cursor" %}
{% set version = "0.7.0" %}

package:
  name: rb-{{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://rubygems.org/downloads/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  sha256: 8985019f9033c8b8d8fe100e39268e4caeb106285ec3b319510b436c7ceb2c5f

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 0
  script:
    - gem install --norc -l -V --ignore-dependencies {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
    - gem unpack {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  skip: {{ win }}

requirements:
  host:
    - ruby
  run:
    - ruby

test:
  commands:
    - ruby -r {{ name }} -e 'exit 0'

about:
  home: https://rubygems.org/gems/{{ name }}
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: {{ name }}-{{ version }}/LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'The purpose of this library is to move the terminal cursor around and manipulate text by using intuitive method calls.'
  doc_url: https://www.rubydoc.info/gems/{{ name }}
  dev_url: https://github.com/piotrmurach/tty-cursor

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - sodre
    - rluria14
    - oblute
    - benhuff
